original: [MAP INFO] *** This map has been created by FuTuRe ***
zh_trans: [地图信息] *** 本地图由 FuTuRe 创建 ***

original: [MAP INFO] *** Special thanks to Syoudous for helping me with a lot of things! ***
zh_trans: [地图信息] *** 特别感谢 Syoudous 对我的帮助！***

original: *** WORLD NUKE INCOMING IN 15 SECONDS! ***
zh_trans: *** 核打击将在 15 秒后到来！***

original: *** WORLD NUKE INCOMING IN 10 SECONDS! ***
zh_trans: *** 核打击将在 10 秒后到来！***

original: *** WORLD NUKE INCOMING IN 5 SECONDS! ***
zh_trans: *** 核打击将在 5 秒后到来！***

original: [MAP INFO] The gate will open in 20 seconds! *****
zh_trans: [地图信息] 大门将在 20 秒后开启！*****

original: [MAP INFO] *** The gate has opened, move on! ***
zh_trans: [地图信息] *** 大门已经打开，继续前进！***

original: [MAP INFO] *** Defend for 25 seconds until the platform breaks! ***
zh_trans: [地图信息] *** 防守 25 秒，直到平台崩塌！***

original: [MAP INFO] *** Get in the hole! ***
zh_trans: [地图信息] *** 进入洞里！***

original: [MAP INFO] The gate is slowly opening, hold this area! ***
zh_trans: [地图信息] 大门正在缓慢开启，守住这个区域！***

original: [MAP INFO] *** Hold here for 25 seconds! ***
zh_trans: [地图信息] *** 在此坚守 25 秒！***

original: [MAP INFO] *** ACTIVATE THE EXPLOSIVE ON THE DOOR ***
zh_trans: [地图信息] *** 启动门上的爆炸装置 ***

original: [MAP INFO] *** Explosives have been set, hold for 30 seconds! ***
zh_trans: [地图信息] *** 炸药已安置，坚守 30 秒！***

original: [MAP INFO] *** 5 seconds left until explosion! ***
zh_trans: [地图信息] *** 距离爆炸还剩 5 秒！***

original: [MAP INFO] ** The metal wall will break down in 15 seconds! ***
zh_trans: [地图信息] *** 金属墙将在 15 秒后被破坏！***

original: [MAP INFO] *** Hold this area until the gate opens, someone must activate the button first! ***
zh_trans: [地图信息] *** 在大门打开前守住这个区域，必须有人先去激活按钮！***

original: [MAP INFO] *** Button has been pressed, hold area until gate opens! ***
zh_trans: [地图信息] *** 按钮已被按下，守住该区域直至大门开启！***

original: [MAP INFO] *** Gate has opened up, move move move! ***
zh_trans: [地图信息] *** 大门已打开，前进前进前进！***

original: [MAP INFO] *** Keep this area until we get sent to the next world! ***
zh_trans: [地图信息] *** 在我们被传送到下一个世界之前守住这个区域！***

original: [MAP INFO] *** Zombies get sent to the new world in 10 seconds!***
zh_trans: [地图信息] *** 10 秒后僵尸将被送往新世界！***

original: [MAP INFO] *** Zombies get sent to the new world in 5 seconds!***
zh_trans: [地图信息] *** 5 秒后僵尸将被送往新世界！***

original: *** HUMANS MUST KILL ZOMBIES WITHIN 60 SECS OR KNIFE IT OUT! ***
zh_trans: *** 人类必须在 60 秒内杀光僵尸，不然就要和僵尸拼刺刀了！***
